website_summaries.verdict: A great value on this set of colors that includes crayons, markers and pencils in one carrying case.
pros: All the markers, crayons, and pencils have their own spot
Handled carrying case that clips closed for easy portability
Great for kids because it offers art supplies kids can use, rather than pastels and paints that can be impractical in other sets
cons: All of the implements in this set have to be carefully put back in their spot, which might make it impractical for the youngest artists

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as advertised. It claims to be a 140 piece set. It has only 124. It also does not include a pad of paper. This may not seem like a big deal to some but if you are a six year old who saved up all of his nickels and dimes to buy an art set with your own money, then it's a pretty big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Tam0129

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the quality of the case but was disappointed ...
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the quality of the case but was disappointed by the contents. The colors of markers I received are not like the ones in the picture I received mostly blue mini markers, I did not receive a single red or orange mini marker.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylena Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Art Set
customer_reviews.text: Great art set ages 3 and up! I bought it as a gift for my granddaughter and she is over the moon thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Janet R Geisler

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Art Kit!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, I buy these art sets as gifts all the time. They are reasonably priced, and are great! No more big containers of broken crayons! No more markers without caps! These sets have little spots for each and every crayon and marker, so my kids actually PUT THEM AWAY. Everything stays organized, and nothing gets lost. We've had one of these cases for over a year, and my kids play with it regularly. I'm a big fan.
customer_reviews.author: Gwaliagirl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic case as everyone has mentioned
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic case as everyone has mentioned. At times this set is listed as $39, and other times as $19. If it is more expensive than $19 or $20, you may want to hold out and see if the price drops over the next few days.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter for her 5th birthday recently. This set is absolutely wonderful! There is such a huge selection of beautiful colors with crayons, colored pencils, and markers and of course Crayola always has good quality products. The case is also very pretty and pretty sturdy. She was so excited when she opened it and we have already gotten a lot of use out of it. It is absolutely worth the $25! I think I might even buy one for myself! ***NOTE*** It does NOT come with scissors, despite the description! I even contacted Crayola about this. So, don't expect that to be in your set.
customer_reviews.author: Tyffani E.

customer_reviews.title: this was hands down his favorite gift. Just to put this into perspective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old for christmas last year...for under $20, this was hands down his favorite gift. Just to put this into perspective, my child loses everything...that is of no interest to him...examples: socks, shoes, homework, etc...but he has not lost a single crayon, colored pencil, or marker out of this set of over 100 pieces, as he treasures this set beyond words lol. This will def be re-purchased in the future for gifts, or to replace ours when the box falls apart from the havoc of being hauled around everywhere my child goes lol.
customer_reviews.author: carolinachic178

customer_reviews.title: Case is not durable
customer_reviews.text: The selection of crayons and markers are great but unfortunately we bought this for the case and it is cracking after less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Cantstopbaking

customer_reviews.title: Markers dried up within a month.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a month ago exactly and the markers are already drying up in this art set. My daughter got this as a gift from us for her birthday and she is very disappointed causing her art projects to fail. She has maintained this art case very well only using it when she does art and putting it back as it came never leaving the caps off and it still dried up...
customer_reviews.author: Electrical Fluke

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect set for children who love to do art work. It comes with crayons, markers, and color pencils. So, there are several color options as well as different coloring tools to choose from. The big briefcase did get old after a while with my daughter. It was too big to put on her desk, so she would have to put it on the floor and bend down every time she needed a color. We ended up just transferring everything to a big activity box. This makes a great gift! Plus, you can neatly store everything in the briefcase box if the size isn't an issue for your craft area.
customer_reviews.author: CatLg

customer_reviews.title: The case is cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I love the organization of this box. The only negative thing is we only had it two days and it broke in half. So disappointed. The whole reason I bought this case.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle & Kim Young

customer_reviews.title: Broken when it arrived (two times)
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it’s great. However, we bought two and both were broken when they arrived. Therefore, I don’t think they are really durable. Still, we didn’t end up returning the second one (I put in for a return and decided not to) because I couldn’t find anything else that I really liked. I wanted Crayola so that I could easily replace the pieces. I wish Crayola made a wooden box or something a bit more durable so that I know it would last through multiple kids. In the end, the crayons and markers are standard Crayola and great for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M. M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost, for sure.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 8 year old daughter who LOVES to draw. She would literally do nothing else if I’d let her, and she loves this set. I went with Crayola brand instead of an unknown brand of the same sort of set up, hoping to get great quality. This set really does seem to be holding up well so far. The box is a thick type of card stock type of material instead of a wooden box. It’s still useable for kids to keep the items stored in. However, ours came slightly crushed on the back but not unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Kids adore this set.
customer_reviews.text: My kids each have one of these and it is a favorite for both of them (4yr and 7yrs). We can easily buy replacements for anything lost/worn out/broken. This keeps the crayons looking great, the markers and colored pencils from getting lost. My kids don't use our bins or clear containers of crayons or makers anymore. They like it organized. We also like giving these as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Snowy

customer_reviews.title: Instills a sense of responsibility over supplies
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. They take much better care of the materials in here than ones we have in regular crayola boxes that inevitably get smashed. The corners did crack a little, but we've had this long enough to wear out 1/3 of the markers and it still holds together well enough. But the best selling point is that the kids actually put their stuff away; we no longer have tons of broken crayons swimming around the bottom of a craft bucket and during art, the desired color is always super easy to find. Price appears to fluctuate a lot. Wait until it's closer to $10 than $40.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: This is my fourth Crayola Art Case! Crayola quality and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these Crayola Art Case's. This is the fourth one I've purchased. It contains everything they need for elementary and middle school art projects. Well, almost everything. It doesn't contain glue or scissors. I'm a fan that all the crayons, colored pencils and markers are stored in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Perry Moraja: Award Winning Author

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but cheap
customer_reviews.text: This product looked so beautiful when i first received it and my kids were so happy to have this. The colors are such a variety and great for both adult and kids. However after having it for 2 months the entire casing has literally fell apart. It is so cheaply made i wish they did a better job with the case. I now have to look for a new storage method for the endless crayons and markers . Unless this case is made stronger i would not recommend anyone buying this. its not worth it for only 2 months, all looks and no use.
customer_reviews.author: Melenie

customer_reviews.title: The price of peace
customer_reviews.text: How much would you pay to keep your child entertained while you visit friends or family? This set is perfect! The eye-appeal of the wide variety of color grabs the child's interest. The variety of mediums holds it. With everything in easy sight, it is easy to use. The case allows them to keep their supplies neat and organized while making them portable. Most toys only hold a child's interest for a brief period. This allows their creativity to grow and bloom, while letting YOU enjoy some adult time! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dabbler64

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful art set with nice briefcase
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice case of art supplies! It's one of my 5 year old daughter's favorite things. It comes with special colors specifically for the trolls them. It comes with some sparkling crayons and sparkly glue. Has some unique colors and some regular colors from Crayola. It also has markers and colored pencils and has a pencil sharpener. It comes with really cute troll coloring pages. I recommend buying this art set, because when you're crayons run out you can always replace them and still have a nice art set. The briefcase is sturdy and will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Poole

customer_reviews.title: I feel like giving a kid free reign with paint is a ...
customer_reviews.text: My eight-year-old son loves this art kit and uses it all the time. I got him this one because it doesn't have paint. I feel like giving a kid free reign with paint is a bad idea, haha. Plus, if they're using paint, then you have to wait for it to dry, otherwise, it will get over all of the other supplies in the kit and drip all over the place. I am a big fan of this kit not including paint. I'd rather keep that separate.
customer_reviews.author: Joy W

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 yr old niece because she loves Trolls and coloring, so I thought this would be the perfect gift! I was very disappointed when I received the kit and the case was torn in half. Will be returning...was wanting to return and order another one, but now the price is about $10 more than when I first bought, so I don't like that I'm having to spend more on a new item because the first one I received was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime J.

customer_reviews.title: Smell/odor
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy! Even after 4 months, it still smells so bad. Initially we thought it was from the case but the smell came from the crayons. We couldn’t believe there are so many good reviews. Amazon needs to investigate it. If I could, I would put a chemical hazard label on it.
customer_reviews.author: pianolove

customer_reviews.title: It's Crayola!
customer_reviews.text: I've never run across a Crayola product I didn't like yet. I send a lot of these products to school children out on the Reservation or Rez children who may be in foster care. I don't always get feedback from the kids, but I do hear a lot of happy comments from those caring for them. The kids are ecstatic! I will be ordering more after the new year; that is, after I get MY Crayola pieces for my personal use :D (You need to be aware that the crayons, pencils, markers and gel pens are popular with everyone out there!)
customer_reviews.author: C. Covington-Brooks

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP case rips at bottom!!!
customer_reviews.text: At first this was awesome!!! However... the cheaply made case started coming apart and the bottom. So now it's separating and it's 2 pieces not one and can't be used for travel. Love the concept, poorly cheaply made. The bottom needs expandable material that can handle the opening and closing of the case!!!! It's cheap paper basically..... crayola products have definitely declined. All China made and poorly at that..looks great.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift and it was a perfect choice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. I was very impressed with how this case is constructed and the assortment included (as advertised.) My friend told me his daughter was extremely happy with it and asks if she can take it with her whenever they leave the house. What I'll mention now is NOT a negative comment and I certainly recommend this... but I was surprised at the weight, it is rather sturdy and felt heavier than I was expecting.. which is a good thing!
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Hill

customer_reviews.title: This Crayola Art Case is a beautiful product. I bought it for my 7 year ...
customer_reviews.text: This Crayola Art Case is a beautiful product. I bought it for my 7 year old niece's birthday & wasn't able to inspect the pieces until the gift was opened. Her expression of joy was priceless, but what I saw was a quality (for the price) case and well organized coloring tools. It came with approx.. 20 sheets of regular sized paper that my niece began using immediately. I would recommend this product for its organization, beautiful colors and quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Revised review: Amazon's & Crayola's Customer Service is EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: After writing my original 3 star review below, I am revising it to 5 starts due to the great customer service from both companies. Amazon sent me a free replacement kit when I returned the damaged one; and Crayola sent me a prepaid gift card for their website. That's the way to do business! Original review: "The actual crayons, markers, etc. are very good. But I’m only giving 3 stars because I was very disappointed in the inside flimsy plastic organizer that the items fit in..."
customer_reviews.author: Robyn S. Gerrard

customer_reviews.title: Idea is cool and comes with a lot of items but items ...
customer_reviews.text: Idea is cool and comes with a lot of items but items are cheap case feel apart the day it was opened.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great for young artists
customer_reviews.text: The 140 piece Crayola Inspiration Art Case will be perfect for my 4 year old grandson who loves to draw. It looks like a quality set, has all the crayons, colored pencils, and markers he could possibly want, and even includes paper. The colorful carrying case will keep all of his supplies neat and organized. There were several choices of images for the case, but the bright colors of the swirling paint design makes it look like fun. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zepf

customer_reviews.title: Classic art kit
customer_reviews.text: This art kit is great for several reasons. 1: it’s in a case so clean up and organization is easy 2: it has 2 types of markers, crayons and colored pencils so your budding artist can explore 3. Crayola has the best quality crayons. 4. The box holds a small amount of paper so it makes it great for travel. For the price, this is as good as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Soumangue

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my twin 4 yr old grandchildren. I have purchased a similar set for my other 2 grandchildren when they were younger and I decided the twins needed their own set. They enjoy using crayons, colored pencils and markers so this set will be used often. I was surprised that some paper came with the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value art kit, comes in its own travel case.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the young artist. Comes with large variety of pens, markers, pencils, crayons - all fit into the included carry case. This is an excellent value. You would easily spend double it’s price if you pieced together all the components. Nice quality art set for the 7 - 15 yo age range. (Advanced 5 or 6 yo may be able to use it as well.) Great value, makes an excellent gift!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Paul

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter and she loves it. She carries it everywhere and I'm pleased that the case is holding up well ( she's 5 ). It comes with a few sheets of paper that didn't last so make sure you purchase a few colouring books and plain paper to go with it. I found that purchasing a ream of printer paper gave her a good supply. Nice kit for the price !
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Makowski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for a Young Artist
customer_reviews.text: The Art Case was a gift for a 7 year old artist, who absolutely loved it--she carried it with her everywhere. I had sent along an extra tablet too, knowing she was going to need more drawing paper. The materials are all by Crayola, and are high quality, as is the carrying case. The case is sturdy and colorful and should hold up well. I'd recommend this set for any budding young artist.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Makes travelling easy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 year old daughter for Christmas. She absolutely LOVES it as so do I for when she wants to color everything is all in 1 case. Makes for easy travelling for when we go to the Dr's and other appointments. When she is done with one color she puts it back so keeps it organized. I'm very pleased and you can't beat the price as crayola is the best. I recommend this to anyone that has kiddos that love to color and or wants to keep them occupied for appointments and or travelling. Or for yourself :) I would totally purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy case lots of colors
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly pleased, as was my son, when my grandson open this for his Christmas present! LOL first thing he said was I need some paper. He didn’t notice that there was a color by number book hidden in the package with it. Great case...lots of colors. Six-year-old completely happy
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: It's Great, But..
customer_reviews.text: Uhhh this package was stolen from me so I had to go and purchase it from Walmart (since it was a Christmas gift). Not going to lie - my nephew wanted a video game or something more, so he kind of just tossed the thing aside when he opened it. However, he does love art and has gotten a lot of use out of it. It's not like one of the art kits where half of the things inside - like the markers, colored pencils, etc, don't work and you have to throw them away. This is Crayola we're talking about. All the included supplies are high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old gtanddaughter for Christmas. We do not live in the same city so I don't see her very often and haven't seen her since Christmas. I can only imagine her delight with this gift because she really enjoys drawing and coloring. Everything is right there in one comtainer. Hope to get some pictures from her soon
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great for a young artist.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a young crafty artist. My daughter is 6 and it was perfect for her. I was a little hesitant at first because of the price but it was worth it. It comes with a lot of name brand supplies: crayons, markers, colored pencils, pencil sharpener, glue stick, special paper, and the loat goes on. The case is really nice too. It works great to keep it all organized.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Broke the barrier for a new friendship
customer_reviews.text: I am part of the Big Brothers Big Sisters program, and I've been having a tough time connecting with my little (who's 6). I felt like I was throwing darts in the dark for what to get her for Christmas, but this present made her light up like nothing else. She's promised that she'll make a drawing for me, and she looked SO cute carrying around this case.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay Gangal

customer_reviews.title: This product works easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this box is ready to use I've used everything everything seems to be going okay I haven't found any dry pans of any kind I was very happy with the product the outer case is still in great shape even though it gets bumped and banged around it's still works a good variety pack for those that might need something more than just pens or one coloring type five stars
customer_reviews.author: Lisa dergan

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping things organized
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've purchase for my now 7 year old. She uses it all the time and I love that she puts every crayon and marker back in its place when she's done. Keeps things neat and organized and makes her put the cap back on before putting it away. She had the first one for about 2 years until the markers started running out and the case began to come apart. Bought her a new one for Christmas and she was thrilled. Hope this one lasts another 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Anon.

customer_reviews.title: Art Case
customer_reviews.text: The case itself is colorful and then when you open it up and see all the organization and all the supplies you get to choose from it's just amazing. I bought this for myself for my adult coloring book projects but I'm thinking of getting another one for my nine year old niece for Christmas. It's very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mazzeo

customer_reviews.title: Great art set!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome set for the price! (Less than $16) This is actually the second one I’ve purchased as I have already gifted one to my young niece who is a budding artist. It was her favorite gift for the holidays! Everything is stored neatly in the box that resembles a small briefcase. Definitely worth purchasing for anyone who enjoys art and to keep everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: DDW

customer_reviews.title: Great set!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! This is the second time we’ve bought these and we have not been disappointed! Tons of markers and crayons in so many colors, and, all at a great price! I do wish it came with more paper because it was gone very quickly with as much art as my girls do but we are still happy with this set overall!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I can finally get rid of the tubs of ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a mess of crayons, markers, colored pencils at our house...... Now that my daughter (6 years) received this item as a gift it's the one she wants to use. So does my 12 year old daughter! I feel like I can finally get rid of the tubs of markers and crayons that are half dead or broken. This is a nice, organized way to color. On a negative note, I'd consider this too large to take on the go. It would feel a bit like carrying a brief case, plus it won't hold the coloring books too so you'd have to have a separate bag for those.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota CB

customer_reviews.title: Good art set but carrier is a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I may give it a 3 1/2. My daughter loved this as a Christmas gift. She is not excessively rough with her things and is actually pretty organized for a preschooler. Anyway, the box is already starting to break with brought her to tears—she’s a little bit Of a perfectionist. The crayons and markers are good quality. I just wish the box was more sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Tim-Anna Hall

customer_reviews.title: My son's "briefcase"
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this. We got this for him when he started getting "homework" from preschool. My only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is that I wish Crayola would have thought about their color selections. They have full size and mini markers, and I wish instead of having two sizes for black, that they would offer other colors. I also wish there was a crayon sharpener/pencil sharpener for the crayons and colored pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lister

customer_reviews.title: Amazing kid's gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 8 year old and he loved it! Great selection! Got it in hopes that it would peel him away from wanting to use the tablet more and it doesn't have that much power but he does use it often! Really great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Diany A.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter art
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 6 year old daughter. She loves to draw and color. This comes with enough supplies to last a while. SO many different colors. Only reason a gave 4 stars is because the case it comes in is falling apart. There's nothing else to put this in to keep it organized so we have ti be very careful getting this out or storing it.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Kiddo loves crayola
customer_reviews.text: So cute, my 5 year old looooves to draw but crayons are everywhere. I like that each one has a spot and they are all laid out so she can see all her colors. Plus the suitcase is fun for playing secret mission! The sparkly crayon and glitter glue are the favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Love that stuff comes in a briefcase!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old grandson is an artist who loves to draw, so when I saw this I knew it was a must have for Christmas. It is so jam packed with lots of goodies that he never gets bored. I loved that it was a travel kit he could take with him and the briefcase concept makes him feel important. He is hooked,best money I ever spent!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon d. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Received Damaged
customer_reviews.text: All 4 corners were ripped and torn. No outside carton damage. This was for a gift and I could not wait for a replacement so I kept it for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great art supplies
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has the pink version so I bought this one for my nephew’s 7th bday and he loves it. Great selection of markers, crayons and colored pencils and easy to keep organized and travel with. The spine tends to be fragile so I recommend making sure the box is latched before picking it up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Owen

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: love the convenience of this case. My son and I love to color and draw. However, its VERY poorly made. CHEAP handles and its just cardboard. I literally picked it up today and the handle snappes. No excessive use or swinging it around. They couldnt even use real screws or anything with the handle. Cheap plastic and cant believe it broke within like a month of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Shoey

customer_reviews.title: Coloring set
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my 5 yr old grandson he loved it he was in awe of how much was in the case using everything especially the markers it was helpful to help him learn to put everything back in place where they belong Thank you it arrived early and in great shape love the case
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great art set for my kids...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this product. They each have one and use it often. The only consideration I would take when buying it is the child's age and temperament. Also, it is narrow so I always store it up in their closets so they can't do any unsupervised wall art.
customer_reviews.author: Selavie

customer_reviews.title: Such a selection
customer_reviews.text: This would be a bit large for travel in the car etc. but is great for home use. The case is high quality and I was very surprised by the selection that was included. Markers, pencils, crayons etc. They are all bright quality colors. Great for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger kids to keep their supplies organized.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! My son (5) wanted a marker set like his older sister, so I got him this. He totes this thing around everywhere and is good about putting everything back where it goes in the kit so he doesn’t lose the pieces. It gets tons of use. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: AmyE

customer_reviews.title: Once you gorilla tape the corners it works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these my kids for Christmas. Ages 4, 7, 9.. It's now the 21 January. I had to gorilla tape the corners of each and every one of these. Once you reinforced corners it works great kids love the art supplies.
customer_reviews.author: John3v36

customer_reviews.title: It makes the perfect gift set for a childs birthday or christmas gift ...
customer_reviews.text: This Crayola Inspiration Art Case has everything in it you could possibly need to get your little artist inspired. It makes the perfect gift set for a childs birthday or christmas gift and comes packed to the brim with everything you could possibly want or need for arts and crafts. The easy to use case comes packed with crayons, markers, paper and much more and makes it easy for traveling in the car and is great for taking on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor C M

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My budding artist LOVES this art set. She is always toting it around and using it to create her latest and greatest works of art. If you have an artist in your family, you can't go wrong with purchasing this art set. It makes a really great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the supplies and was excited about the case hoping it would be better then the walmart plastic ones because its crayola but within 2 weeks it ripped along the sides because its basically cardboard. Its didnt get wet and broke from simply beginning regularly opened
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei S Pender

customer_reviews.title: Beautifuly packaged and great as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my best friends daughter and she loved it! She’s really into arts and crafts, so I figured she would be really into this. It’s packaged beautifully, I almost wanted to keep it for myself. It’s great as a gift for kids and even adults who love to have some fun.
customer_reviews.author: Java

customer_reviews.title: The box is fantastic and the contents are great
customer_reviews.text: The box is fantastic and the contents are great, but the plastic insert that holds all of the art supplies in came unglued right away. That makes it hard to close the box, and is annoying in general. I can just glue it back in, but it's annoying. My five year old does love this, though. She's quite particular about her things, so it's good for her to have a way to organize art supplies.
customer_reviews.author: True Regana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Color Case
customer_reviews.text: My five year old LUVS this! The case is not made of metal but more of a thicker cardboard. Makes sense, to not make it so heavy, although may be more susceptible to dings or scratches. I will say this box has had its fair share of mishandling by my five year old, and has yet to show any signs of damage. But, my kiddo has been able to keep the crayons/markers/pencils contained and organized, that’s a plus....I think the attractive design leaves the desire to keep it all together. That may some wishful thinking though ;)
customer_reviews.author: Mili

customer_reviews.title: Put Together Very Well
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my thirty-year-old grandchild who is into art, and it was love at first sight. This is a really attractive set of crayons, colored pencils, and washable markers. It's bound to please. I bought two more to give to other young relatives.
customer_reviews.author: jderrico

customer_reviews.title: Love it except for wierd smell from crayons.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Perfect gift option. Good for summer break. I find the smell of crayons is bit wierd. But it just bothers me. Not anyone else in the house. So won't cut any points for that. But yes except for that smell from crayons overall a good gift option
customer_reviews.author: SociableMe4U

customer_reviews.title: Variety of colors.
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for my grandchildren. So many colors to choose from and so many options; crayons, pencils and markers. I strongly recommend this art kit for children. And it keeps it neat and organized for those of us who prefer organization b
customer_reviews.author: Marie S.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter as a tooth fairy gift. It's got everything nice and neat in the case and very surprisingly she has kept it that way. She uses it here and there for her art projects and loves the variety of utencils she can use.
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Love it- perfect for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! He is 5 and It’s perfect because it has crayons and markers and No paint like most cases. The only thing is the case breaks easily so I wish it was made with wood. I reinforced it with duck tape and that worked well. I do love that it’s not plastic- that breaks faster and sharp if it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Estefania Holler

customer_reviews.title: Best birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6year olds birthday and she's told me more than once that this was the best gift she had received. I have seen her carrying the case with her when she travels too. It did break a little on one edge but I'll probably just glue that or add tape.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: For creative minds
customer_reviews.text: This art set will be a Christmas gift for my great-grandson. He is in kindergarten and loves writing and coloring. He's going to love this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for christmas and it was great! I have found it solved our issue of not picking up our crayons since each crayon/marker/etc. has a specific place. I would certainly gift it again to someone else. Perhaps a little pricey but it is crayola...
customer_reviews.author: jylog

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: A nice basic set for a young artist. I wish it would have had watercolors with it, but not a huge deal. Any of the sets that had watercolors also had oil pastels and I wasn't wanting those for him quite yet. He is enjoying it and used it to draw pictures to put in with all of his Christmas Thank-You notes.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great for the little artists.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my little artist, he loves that it has pencils crayons and markers. Now we have art all over the house. Having it in the box helps keeping it organized too.
customer_reviews.author: wilber j cronk

customer_reviews.title: Very good for my eight year old niece
customer_reviews.text: She likes it very much and the variety of colors are good. This was purchased last year but she is doing a good job keeping up with all the pieces. This year since being on lock down this particular unit is coming in very handy.
customer_reviews.author: JYE

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift for color loving kids!!!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT gift from Santa!!! My two year old LOVES to color and it's just a cold set. I love that it helps keep it all organized too. No more dumping them all for mom to clean up. It's super lightweight and easy to totes around.
customer_reviews.author: Knapp

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter loves it! It's got so many colors, this will last her a long time. I only wish that there were a little bit of a solution to keep the papers inside it in place without using the envelope. I bought her a coloring book which fit inside it easily (it's a big one) and kinda helped keeping the smaller papers, originally with the case, in place. Product enhancements would be to round the corners of the thing (had an owie incident) and to maybe to a simple lid solution for the papers inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Dandy to the Rescue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you love options
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 2.5 year old daughter who absolutely adores coloring. She was ecstatic to get it and has used it almost daily since. I love that she can choose between more than one medium (vs only having crayons or markers or pencils individually). My older kiddos enjoy it as well. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily L

customer_reviews.title: Great inside, crummy outside.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son as a Christmas gift. The inside is holding up great but the outside not so much. The case is made out of just plain cardboard. It is literally disintegrating and falling apart. Soon we will need to pull all materials out and find something else for our son to use. The cardboard case last roughly 30 days before it began falling apart. Pretty disappointing :(
customer_reviews.author: Jen Reitz Scholz

customer_reviews.title: Encourage creativity!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my neighbor's son and he loves it. He takes special care of it and enjoys coloring and drawing. It is a nice set for kids because they are encouraged to put things away in the case. This is also great because it encourages kids to put down the electronic or computerized stuff and be creative!
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: A boy or girl gift that stretches their imagination.
customer_reviews.text: We were having a Toy's for Tots campaign in our office. There were lots of boy toys and few girl toys...our office is 90% male. So I remembered that my grandson got a drawing set similar to Art Case. Now 12 years later he is an in demand artist. Art cases are gender nuteral.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kurtzman

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for organizing and containing all of their art supplies
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these cases that I've bought for my kids. It's perfect for organizing and containing all of their art supplies. They actually enjoy putting their crayons/colored pencils/markers away in this box. Crayola products are the best for coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: My son who is 7 loved this set! He loved coloring with markers so it was important that we got one that included markers. It’s a big too big for travel but we didn’t buy it for that so it didn’t matter to much to us.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria t

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for child
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best art set I ever bought for a child’s gift. 5 year old played with it for hours. It’s a huge set and good quality. Pair it with a drawing pad and gift this great set to any creative child you know.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting if caring properly
customer_reviews.text: My little niece loved this gift!!! She has had it for a year and there is not one single piece missing! They are all still coloring! She uses une color and puts it in its place before using the next item she wants to use. She is very proud and loves her colors. It has soo many colors and means to colors that it makes up for long coloring times.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased with this product. I gifted it to My niece for her birthday. She loves to be organized and this really allows her to do that and know where everything is! It also has all the different types of coloring utensils like markers, crayons, and colored pencils. It’s the great crayons quality we have come to love in a great case that closes securely so you can take it in the car!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Corrao

customer_reviews.title: Left out in the rain
customer_reviews.text: This order was delivered to the foot of my driveway.not my house. My driveway is long and and cannot be seen from the house. It was left out in the rain all night. The box and items were soaked. The product is nice. The one star is because the delivery person did not bother to drive up the driveway but dumped this and a couple other packages out in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: mona

customer_reviews.title: Holiday Hit!
customer_reviews.text: Little Blake, 4 1/2 years old, (and his parents) went nuts over this set, which entertained him happily throughout the "adult" part of the holiday festivities. He especially liked the beautifully organized, carry-all box with its dedicated compartment for each of the great variety of crayons, pencils and markers. He quickly learned to push on one end of his chosen color, making the other end pop up and easy to grab. I did purchase extra paper, and paint and brush sets to vary the activities and to "round out" this easy-to-present gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Nunn

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 5-6 year olds.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5 1/2 y.o. granddaughter. She absolutely loves it and treats it with great respect. Every pen, pencil and crayon gets put back in its place without my having to remind her. She should get several years of fun from her art case. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the case, it’s very durable. Only complaint is I think the markers aren’t ‘true to their color’ .. meaning they look like the regular crayons markers but some of the colors - like yellow or blue, isn’t what I expected. Very good quality otherwise , would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: samantha lamb

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good value. You get so much for so little money. This would make a excellent Christmas gift or birthday gift. I highly highly recommend this product. It is put together so well and it has everything you need to do a art project.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Perreira

customer_reviews.title: Little sister loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: There are dozens of choices to choose from whether you want markers, crayons, color pencils etc. My 9 year old sister loved this set I bought for her and I plan to buy more for my cousins and niece on their birthdays. The shipping was fast too, the kit came the day after I ordered it and was personally handed to me instead of being left on my front doorstep which I appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Khadiza

customer_reviews.title: Great Art Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a good gift for the artists in your family. It came with just about all you need to enjoy hours of creativity.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Loveless

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable set
customer_reviews.text: Our crayons we're all over the place until we got this. This is a great set to keep things organized. Affordable too. I wish the case was plastic or another hard material to protect against water. Still great though.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCat

customer_reviews.title: Great for in the car!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for travel and keep it in the car. Perfect to entertain kids for long distance travel. I love that everything is contained in one case, and can easily lay flat in the back of the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: VLLyons

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my step daughter so I havent been able to physically look at it besides the outside. She'll love it and Crayola has never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Yost

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful art case
customer_reviews.text: One of my granddaughters had this case and when my other granddaughter saw it she also wanted one. She loved it as now they both have the same case. The 140 colors, pencils and markers are perfect to color and stay busy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and amazing organization that is simple to keep up with
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got one as a gift and I had to purchase another right away for my nieces. With toddlers and young kids it is wonderful to have a case to contain everything! My four year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Byron

product_meta.title: Crayola Inspiration Art Case Coloring Set, Kids Indoor Activities At Home, 140 Art Supplies
product_meta.description:
Style:ClassicCrayola Inspiration Art Case Coloring Set, Kids Indoor Activities At Home, 140 Art Supplies Product description (optional) : Bring an all-in-one portable art studio with you wherever you go with the Crayola Inspiration Art Case Coloring Set. With 140 different coloring tools featuring washable markers, crayons, and short colored pencils, you can keep creating for hours at a time. Choose from a huge selection of colors to make your mark on any project. A special compartment for each tool means staying organized is simple and the attached handle brings ease to taking your coloring supplies on-the-go. With all the basics to start making bold designs, this art case for kids and adults is recommended for ages 5 and up.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Portable Inspiration Art Case is an all-inclusive durable case designed to carry anywhere. The snap-fit trays keep art supplies organized.
feature_bullets: Includes 1 Crayola Inspiration Art Case Coloring Set with 64 crayons, 20 short colored pencils, 40 washable markers and 15 large pieces of paper
With a place for everything, this crayon and marker organizer helps keep art supplies for kids and adults together
Large paper sheets give kids more room to create
With everything you need to get started creating, this case makes a great gift for girls and boys
Artists ages 5 and up can use these non-toxic art supplies

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars8,988 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
